page.title: 09THE CIRCUS
page.content:
The American Circus Hoffman has set up camp on the recreation ground at the bottom of Porters Way. They invited all the school to visit them during the day to see the animals. We went, a class at a time. There were 5 beautiful tigers lazing in their cages but they became very alert and growled softly when a small dog ran past. There were 2 small elephants, ponies horses,lamas and camels. They were all in a huge tent with the sides rolled up and each end open because it was a very hot day. All the animals looked well cared for.
All the children were given a voucher so that they could see the show in the eveneing at a cheaper price.
